answerText: Umberto Eco[10] A collection of essays by Eco that concerns such topics as Dennis Gabor's holography and the fortresses of solitude, as well as America's penchant for simulacra is called Travels in [this concept]. This concept is basically the phenomenon of humanity favoring VR or AI more so than what is real.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 9 | 12 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This author wrote about the beneficial impact of incorrect beliefs on progress in an essay in Serendipities. [10] Name this Italian essayist, who whose non-fiction includes a postscript to his novel The Name of the Rose.
